title: South Koreans Fascinated With Altcoins More Than Americans, Research Shows
description: South Korean crypto traders are more inclined to invest in high-risk, high-reward altcoins than their American counterparts, according to a new report. The share of major cryptocurrencies like bitcoin and ethereum in the trading volumes on the largest Korean exchange is much smaller than the one registered on the leading U.S. exchange, the research indicates. […]

title: Binance debuts BNB safe{wallet} for enhanced security
description: Binance, a prominent figure in the cryptocurrency arena, has recently fortified its user security measures by launching the BNB Safe{Wallet}. This novel multi-signature wallet, integral to the safety of digital assets, employs the Gnosis Safe Protocol’s robust framework. Available on Binance Smart Chain (BSC) and opBNB, the wallet marks a significant enhancement in how users ... Read more

title: President Joe Biden’s Executive Order: Implications for XRP and the Crypto Market
description: The cryptocurrency market is no stranger to regulatory uncertainties, and recent developments suggest that President Joe Biden’s impending executive order on artificial intelligence (AI) could have significant implications, including potential chaos for XRP and the broader digital asset space. title: Ethereum’s POWR Token Rockets 50% in a Week; Binance Launches 50x Leverage Futures
description: The Binance exchange has launched futures trading for the Powerledger (POWR) token. The Ethereum-based altcoin has also recorded a massive uptick in weekly gains, going up by more than 50%. title: Solana (SOL) Price Analysis: How Feasible Is the Rise to $39?
description:
With increasing strength, SOL may hit $39, according to Michaël van de Poppe.  A correction to $26 is likely as indicated by the MFI and AO.
